makefile-tools.command.makefile.buildCle.message: Makefile: Clean and build the current target
Makefile: Clean and build the target ALL

makefile-tools.command.makefile.launchDe.message: Makefile: Debug the selected binary target

makefile-tools.command.makefile.launchRu.message: Makefile: Run the selected binary target in the terminal

makefile-tools.command.makefile.setBuild.message: Makefile: Set the current build configuration
Makefile: Set the target to be built by make

makefile-tools.command.makefile.setLaunc.message: Makefile: Set the make launch configuration

makefile-tools.command.makefile.resetSta.message: Makefile: Reset the Makefile Tools Extension workspace state (For troubleshooting)
comment: 'Makefile' and 'Makefile Tools' should not be translated

makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.ma: The path to the make tool
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.co: The name of the makefile configuration
File path to the make command
Folder path passed to make via the -C switch
Arguments to pass to the make command
Problem matcher names to use when building the current target
File path to the build log used instead of dry-run output
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.de: The non VS debugger type: gdb or lldb
Path to the non VS debugger (gdb or lldb)
Stop at the entry point of the target
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.la: The full path to the binary to run or debug
Arguments to pass to program command line
Set the working directory for the program
The non VS debugger type: gdb or lldb
Path to the non VS debugger (gdb or lldb)
Stop at the entry point of the target
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.lo: The logging level for the makefile tools extension
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.ma: The folder path to be passed to make via the switch -C
The path to the makefile of the project
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.bu: The path to the build log that is read to bypass a dry-run
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.ex: The path to various output files produced by the extension. Defaults to the VS Code workspace storage location.

makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.ex.message: The path to an output file storing all content from the Makefile output channel. Defaults to the value of the 'makefile.extensionOutputFolder' setting.

makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.co: The path to a cache file storing the output of the last dry-run make command. When unset, a file named 'configurationCache.log' is stored at the path specified by the 'makefile.extensionOutputFolder' setting.
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.dr: Arguments to pass to the dry-run make invocation
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.ad: Names of compiler tools to be added to the extension known list
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.ex: Names of compiler tools to be excluded from the extension known list
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.sa: Commands that are safe to perform command substitution with

makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.co.message: Automatically configure Makefile project directories when they are opened
Automatically configure Makefile project directories when any relevant makefiles and/or settings are changed
Automatically configure Makefile project directories after relevant operations, like change build configuration or makefile target

makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.pr: The path to the script that needs to be run at least once before configure
Arguments to pass to the pre-configure script
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.po: The path to the script that needs to be run at least once after configure
Arguments to pass to the post-configure script
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.al: Always run the pre-configure script before configure
Always run the post-configure script after configure
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.ig: Don't analyze directory changing commands like cd, push, pop.
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.sa: Save opened files before building or configuring
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.bu: Build the current target before launch (debug/run)
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.cl: Clear the output channel at the beginning of a build
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.co: The path to the compilation database file
makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.pa: Enable debugging locally (in this host) images built by this extension
Enable running locally (in this host) images built by this extension

makefile-tools.configuration.makefile.pa.message: Modify this setting to control the visibility setting in the Makefile Project Outline panel.
comment: 'Makefile Project Outline' should not be translated
